article_title: Hamas political leader Ismail Haniyeh killed in Iran
sentence: Israel  has  not  commented,  but  it  has  promised  to  destroy  Hamas  following  the  7  October  attack  on  southern  Israel  which  killed  1,200  people.

article_title: Hamas political leader Ismail Haniyeh killed in Iran
sentence: Following  Hamas's  attack  on  7  October  which  killed  1,200  people,  Israel  responded  with  an  ongoing  military  operation  in  the  Gaza  Strip  which  has  killed  at  least  39,445  people,  according  to  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry.
